Package com.xebisco.yield

Class RelativeFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.RelativeFile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AudioClip, IniFileWrapper, JsonFileWrapper, SaveFile, TextFile, Texture
    public class RelativeFile
extends java.lang.Object
    It's a wrapper for an input stream that can be closed

      • RelativeFile

    • Method Detail

      • flush

        public void flush()
        If the input stream is not null, close it and set it to null. The first thing the function does is check if the input stream is null. If it is, the function returns immediately. If it's not, the function tries to close the input stream. If the close operation fails, the function throws a RuntimeException.

      • getInputStream

        public java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
        This function returns the inputStream variable.
        Returns:
        The inputStream variable is being returned.

      • setInputStream

        public void setInputStream​(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
        This function sets the inputStream variable to the inputStream parameter.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The input stream to read the file from.

      • getCachedPath

        public java.lang.String getCachedPath()
        This function returns the path of the cached file
        Returns:
        The cachedPath variable is being returned.

      • isFlushAfterLoad

        public boolean isFlushAfterLoad()
        Returns true if the file will be flushed after use.
        Returns:
        The flushAfterLoad property.

      • setFlushAfterLoad

        public void setFlushAfterLoad​(boolean flushAfterLoad)
        Sets if the file will be flushed after use.
        Parameters:
        flushAfterLoad - The flushAfterLoad value to set.
